entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
